contentrichtext.text: {{fmbox |id = mw-readonlytext |type = editnotice |image = [[File:Padlock.svg|45px|Database locked]] |text = The Wikipedia database is temporarily in read-only mode for the following reason: <div>'''$1'''</div> This is probably due to routine maintenance; if so, you will be able to edit again within a few minutes. Sorry for any inconvenience this might have caused. You can continue to browse Wikipedia articles while the database is locked. For further information, you can visit the [irc://irc.freenode.net/wikipedia #wikipedia] channel on the [http://freenode.net/ freenode] [[Internet Relay Chat|IRC]] network. }}
